text: The Artsakh Defence Army also known as the Nagorno-Karabakh (NKR) Defense Army was founded on 9 May 1992, as the formal defence force of the unrecognized Nagorno-Karabakh Republic, made up of Armenians. It is internationally recognised to be part of Azerbaijan. == Related pages == * 2020 Nagorno- Karabakh war Category:Military of Armenia
title: Artsakh Defence Army
